app_descript:
StarMaker

Brief: StarMaker is the ultimate music app for vocalists eager to showcase their talent. Whether you're into Pop, Hip hop, R&B, or Folk, this app caters to every singer. Select from millions of tracks, enjoy high-quality backing music, roll with the lyrics, tweak your recordings with a plethora of voice effects and video filters, and broadcast your performances across various social platforms. With StarMaker, not only can you create stunning music videos but also engage with top artists through duets and live music concerts, gaining fans and likes on your journey to superstardom.
